turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Hello how are u?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Hey there! I’m doing well, thanks for asking. How about you — how’s your day going so far?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: My day was so good. I'm enjoying it, and I'm studying, and I enjoy it a lot. How about you?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That’s great to hear! Sounds like you’re having a productive and fun day. What are you studying at the moment?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes, now I need to study with you! Are you already?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, I’m ready! What would you like to study today — conversation, grammar, vocabulary, or something else?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Okay! Today we're going to do a simulation of scheduling an appointment. You will be the secretary for Dr. Charles' consultant, and I need to schedule an appointment; I need you to behave as if you were a real secretary.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright! Good afternoon, this is Dr. Charles’ office. How can I help you today — are you calling to schedule a new appointment or to change an existing one?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “To do an appointment,”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! Let’s get that set up for you. Now, could you let me know what kind of appointment you’re looking to book with Dr. Charles? For example, is it a general consultation or something specific?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Always specific, because I think I took allergies and I need help.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, got it. So we'll note that it's for allergy issues. Now, let me check Dr. Charles’ schedule. Could you tell me if you prefer a morning or afternoon appointment?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Please I would like on Wednesday, please!.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, afternoon it is! Let's see what we have available. Now, can you let me know which day of the week works best for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Could you repeat, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! I was just asking which day of the week would work best for your appointment. Let me know what day you prefer.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, okay. For me, it's the best if we Wednesday at the afternoon or Friday at the afternoon.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, that helps! Let me just check… We can definitely do Wednesday afternoon. Now, can I have your full name to put the appointment under?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Of course my name is Vianna do Valle Junior.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, thank you! I’ve got you down for Wednesday afternoon. Now, just to confirm, do you have any preference for the time slot—like early or late afternoon?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Early, early. Yes, I think it's best.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, early afternoon it is! I’ll book you in for the first available slot after lunch. And is there anything else you’d like us to know before your appointment?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Could you repeat, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! I was just asking if there's anything else you'd like us to know before your appointment. Let me know if you have any other details to share.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, I think when I stay together with the doctor, I will see other things about my body because sometimes I have allergies in other parts of my body.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that makes sense. The doctor can definitely go over all of that with you. For now, we’re all set with your appointment. Anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “If I needed to change my schedule, there is Cancelling 3.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure thing! If you do need to change your appointment, just give us a call and there's no cancellation fee. Now, is there anything else you'd like to ask about the scheduling process?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, no, it's okay for me. It's amazing, your attendance.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great, I’m glad to hear that! In that case, your appointment is all set. If you need anything else, just let us know. Thanks for scheduling with us!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you. Sorry, could you repeat which day you scheduled for me, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! We’ve got you scheduled for Wednesday afternoon. Let me know if that still works for you or if you need any changes.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I think Friday is the best, could you check if you have a schedule, if it's available in the semi-hour, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! Let me take a look. We do have a Friday slot available around the same time. I’ll switch you to Friday afternoon. Anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “That's just it. Now I'm very grateful to you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'm glad we could sort that out. If there's nothing else, I’ll leave it here. Thanks for scheduling with us, and have a great day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thanks so much. I hope you have a great day.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you! I appreciate that. Have a wonderful day yourself, and take care!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thanks!”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure thing! Happy to help. If you need anything else, just let me know. Take care!
